name: interfluvial
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
between streams or rivers: Low-lying interfluvial areas show the development of swamps and ponds. Interfluvial hollows which are now dry were once flooded or badly drained. Related word
interfluve
More examplesFewer examplesThe interfluvial areas include large tracts of mud located above the major channels.Villages tended to be located in the valleys of the major rivers while the higher interfluvial areas were avoided.Scientists have carried out a study of interfluvial deposits in the plain of the Ganges.
